text: Germersheim is a district in the south-east of Rhineland-Palatinate, Germany. The Rhine river forms the eastern boundary of the district. The river Lauter forms most of the southern boundary. ==Towns and municipalities== Towns Verbandsgemeinden Verbandsgemeinden #Germersheim #Wörth am Rhein *1.
